recipes.name: boiled duck
recipes.instructions: boil duck in water for 20 minutes. take it out. serve.

recipes.name: crispy potatoes
recipes.instructions: bake potatoes in oven for 1hr. take it out. serve.

recipes.name: edited apple pie
recipes.ingredients: flour, granny smith apples, water, butter, sugar, eggs, milk.
recipes.instructions: Bake until golden brown. Let cool and serve.
